00003 #include "ORDataProcessor.hh"

00008 ORDataProcessor::ORDataProcessor(ORVDataDecoder* decoder)
00009 { 
00010   fDataId = ORVDataDecoder::GetIllegalDataId(); 
00011   fDoProcess = true;
00012   fDoProcessRun = true;
00013   fDataDecoder = decoder;
00014   fDebugRecord = false;
00015   fRunContext = NULL;
00016 }
00017 
00018 void ORDataProcessor::SetDataId() 
00019 { 
00020   if (fRunContext == NULL) {
00021     ORLog(kError) << "fRunContext is NULL!" << endl;
00022     return;
00023   }
00024   const ORHeader* header = fRunContext->GetHeader();
00025   if (header == NULL) {
00026     ORLog(kError) << "SetDataId(): SetDataId for path " 
00027                   << fDataDecoder->GetDataObjectPath() 
00028                   << ": header was NULL!" << endl;
00029     return;
00030   }
00031   fDataId = header->GetDataId(fDataDecoder->GetDataObjectPath());
00032   if (fDataId == ORVDataDecoder::GetIllegalDataId()) {
00033     ORLog(kWarning) << "SetDataId(): Couldn't get a valid data id for data "
00034                   << "object path " << fDataDecoder->GetDataObjectPath()
00035                   << endl;
00036   }
00037 }
00038 
00039 void ORDataProcessor::SetDecoderDictionary()
00040 {
00041   if (fRunContext == NULL) {
00042     ORLog(kError) << "fRunContext is NULL!" << endl;
00043     return;
00044   }
00045   const ORHardwareDictionary* hardwareDict = fRunContext->GetHardwareDict();
00046   if (!hardwareDict) {
00047     ORLog(kError) << "Hardware dictionary not found!  Some info may not be available" << std::endl; 
00048     return;
00049   }
00050   fDataDecoder->SetDecoderDictionary(
00051     hardwareDict->GetDecoderDictionary(fDataDecoder->GetDictionaryObjectPath()));
00052   /* This sets to NULL if it doesn't exist. */
00053 }
00054 
00055 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDataProcessor::ProcessDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00056 {
00057   if (!fDoProcess || !fDoProcessRun || !fRunContext) return kFailure;
00058   else if (fDataDecoder->DataIdOf(record) == fDataId) {
00059     ORLog(kDebug) << fDataDecoder->GetDataObjectPath() 
00060                   << " (data id = " << fDataId << "): " << endl;
00061     if(fRunContext->MustSwap() && !fRunContext->IsRecordSwapped()) {
00062       /* Swapping the record.  This only must be done once! */
00063       fDataDecoder->Swap(record);
00064       fRunContext->SetRecordSwapped();
00065     }
00066     if(fDebugRecord) {
00067       if(ORLogger::GetSeverity() > ORLogger::kDebug) {
00068         ORLog(kRoutine) << fDataDecoder->GetDataObjectPath() 
00069                         << " (data id = " << fDataId << "): " << endl;
00070       }
00071       fDataDecoder->DumpHex(record);
00072     }
00073     return ProcessMyDataRecord(record);
00074   }
00075   else return kSuccess;
00076 }
